title: The Edinburgh Festival
brief_description: Highlights of the Edinburgh Festivals of 1963 and 1964 closing with one of the most popular items in the Festival, the Military Tattoo on the esplanade of Edinburgh Castle. (Awarded a Cup by the Minister of Tourism, 7th International Festival of Tourist Films, Milan, 1966)
